# MindGrade Backend

This is the backend API for the MindGrade application.

## Setup

Backend implementation is pending. You can add your backend server here (Node.js/Express, Python/Flask, etc.)

## Structure

```
backend/
├── src/          # Source code
├── routes/       # API routes
├── models/       # Data models
├── middleware/   # Middleware functions
└── config/       # Configuration files
```
